Posts.Content: tsp4406 wrote: I am 41 years old and I found a lump in my right breast a week ago. I saw my obgyn and he said he didn't feel anything, just normal breast tissue. He went ahead and ordered a mammogram/ultrasound just in case. Well it turns out that they did find something suspicious, and it's a bi rad 5. I am scheduled for a core biopsy on 1/11...freaking out.
